content: Our mentor's feedback on our whitepaper draft was critical. We're now incorporating case studies from our past projects to illustrate the ethical implications of cognitive augmentation.
Took a much-needed break to meet with friends. Discussed the blockchain voting project, and they suggested we look into mobile voting. It's like the universe is telling us to keep pushing boundaries.

Just got back from a city council meeting about our urban AI project. They've given us the green light to expand to more neighborhoods. It's a step forward, but we're still navigating the ethical maze.
